wikipedia_page.main: Jack Breslin (born 6 April 1997) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Petershill.

response: After beginning his career with Hibernian, McGregor moved on loan to Berwick Rangers in January 2016. He signed for Hamilton Academical in July 2016. He made his debut for Hamilton in a 3–0 victory against St Mirren in the League Cup on 23 July 2016, alongside fellow debutantes Massimo Donati and Jack Breslin.
